channel.description: Twitter feed for: @emilianobonassi. Generated by nitter.freedit.eu

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: G7 Network from @G7_DAO is live on mainnet today.
G7 is the @Arbitrum L3 where devs get top-tier onchain gaming infrastructure.
G7 is launching with the full Arbitrum stack, with @circle’s Bridged USDC Standard integration from Conduit Marketplace.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
G7 Network from @G7_DAO is live on mainnet today.

G7 is the @Arbitrum L3 where devs get top-tier onchain gaming infrastructure.

G7 is launching with the full Arbitrum stack, with @circle’s Bridged USDC Standard integration from Conduit Marketplace.

nitter.freedit.eu/G7_DAO/status/1886897963353694319#m

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: 🚨 We have cut the Foundry v1.0 Release Candidate, and published a migration guide. 🚨
Run `foundryup -i rc` to get the RC binaries and try it out.
It is important to us we get your feedback as this is the last step before the official 1.0 release after three years.
Docs link in thread below.
item.dc:creator: @gakonst
item.description:
🚨 We have cut the Foundry v1.0 Release Candidate, and published a migration guide. 🚨

Run `foundryup -i rc` to get the RC binaries and try it out.

It is important to us we get your feedback as this is the last step before the official 1.0 release after three years.

Docs link in thread below.

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: 📢 Phala Network Joins NVIDIA Inception Program
Phala is thrilled to be joining @nvidia Inception Program to accelerate our mission to bring Confidential AI to Web3! This milestone unlocks cutting-edge AI tech, expert support, and ecosystem collaboration for Phala Network to drive the future of trustworthy AI.
#NVIDIAInception
item.dc:creator: @PhalaNetwork
item.description:
📢 Phala Network Joins NVIDIA Inception Program

Phala is thrilled to be joining @nvidia Inception Program to accelerate our mission to bring Confidential AI to Web3! This milestone unlocks cutting-edge AI tech, expert support, and ecosystem collaboration for Phala Network to drive the future of trustworthy AI.

#NVIDIAInception

item.title: RT by @emilianobonassi: The go-ethereum team is hiring a staff software engineer to help ~accelerate~ Ethereum! item.title:
up only!
and yeah, they are using @celestia as well
some history 🔖
@OrderlyNetwork was a pioneer on using advanced technologies early '24 - one of the first rollups to leverage SuperBlobs
actually, they were the trigger. they need high-throughput DA. we built for them 🏗️
